original_title: 犯された女子アナ 失意の号泣四連鎖
overview: Four beautiful girls Anna, Shizuku, Sumire, Mio, and Hitomi who are at the peak of their popularity. Yoshimura, a corporate yakuza who targets these girls, plans to use them as entertainment slaves. With Shizuku and Sumire sisters at the core, Yoshimura manipulates the four sisters indecently through a chain of intimidation.
title: Raped Female Anchor – Foursome Gangbang And Cries Of Despair
